item.description:
Get ready to get sweaty.

It's again time to descend upon the Cantab Lounge in Cambridge's Central Square for a night of dancing to The Chicken Slacks.  The Chicken Slacks always bring it each and every Thursday night, but a show to kick off the official start of summer is certain to be special.

I suspect that a lot of you are taking Friday, 6 July off to continue your Independence Day celebration, so why not kick it off with a vengeance by joining your fellow Drinking Buddies for a night of R&B and Soul Bacchanalia?

 

Details:

  • The Cantab is on the small side and it will fill up; there are sometimes waiting lines outside.
  • I'll be at the Cantab at 9.  If others arrive by 9 also, we can grab the limited supply of tables or bar seats.
  • The music starts at 9:30 and continues until 1:30.
  • The cover charge is $5 at the door.  Please note that the Cantab is cash only.
  • The Cantab is located steps from the Central Square Red Line T station.
  • Some street parking is available near the Cantab.  It's generally free after 8, but a couple of small lots are not free until 10.  Please be sure to check signs.
  • There's also a taxi stand on the same block on Mass Ave.
  • As noted above, I look like my profile picture.  I'll be hanging at the bar and I'll also email my cell # to all Yes RSVPers on the afternoon of the show.
  • Not familiar with the Slacks?  Check them out on their website.
  • This is a joint meetup with the Cambridge-Somerville Live Music and Social Fun meetup groups.
item.how_to_find_us: I look like my profile picture. I'll be hanging at the bar and I'll also email my cell # to all Yes RSVPers on the afternoon of the show.
item.name: Let's kick off summer with The Chicken Slacks!
